name: The Notzing Project (Demo)
description:
After working on this game for about a month for the Haunted PS1 game jam, I've decided to cut some stuff out temporarily, and release a very short demo showcasing the feel that the game will have. For this demo, there's no ending, and no goal. I want to have people testing what I have so far, so I can take a lot more time to flesh out the full game and make it something great! 

Keep your eyes peeled.
